future_error&amp; operator=( const future_error&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}

Assigns the contents with those of {{c|other}}. If {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} both have dynamic type {{tt|std::future_error}} then {{c|1=std::strcmp(what(), other.what()) == 0}} after assignment.
